reviews.review_msg: Attends every lecture and relies on youtube videos to understand the material. Funny how 5 minutes videos explain so much better than her 2 hour lecture.

Very self-directed teaching method. Lectures will cover a topic like an income statement, tutorials will review textbook questions regarding income statements, but when it comes down to creating and putting appropriate information into an income statement, you must learn that yourself through the textbook. Previous ACCBUS experience  is recomended
her name is actually Anne MacDonald and she is highly recommended for 251.

Very gentle and nice prof!Even though his lectures notes tend to lose you sometimes but if you read through the chapters in the textbook you will go good than average on his exams! His finals are easier than midterms and VERY similar to his practices questions!
